definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Simaqian is one of the greatest historiographers who has spiritual freedom .
sentences.chinese: 司馬遷是一個具有自由精神的偉大的歷史學家。

sentences.english: Most historians peg the first celebration of Christmas to Rome in 336 AD.
sentences.chinese: 大部分歷史學家掛聖誕慶祝羅馬首次在公元336。

sentences.english: As one of the most distinguished historian in China, Mr.
sentences.chinese: 田昌五先生是我國著名的歷史學家。

sentences.english: Huang Zongzhi is one of the most famous legal historian.
sentences.chinese: 黃宗智先生是當代最負盛名的法律史學家。

sentences.english: Some word historians say that nitty-gritty refers to the debris – or remains -- left on the floor of slave ships.
sentences.chinese: 一些單詞歷史學家說這個詞指的是販奴船上的碎片。

sentences.english: And archivists, historians, begin to reflect that trend.
sentences.chinese: 檔案保管人和歷史學家們開始對這種趨勢進行反思。

sentences.english: A new poll of historians just came out.And the poll has named former President George W.
sentences.chinese: 對歷史學家做的一項新的民意調查剛剛公佈出來。
所有歷史學家都是故事講述者。

sentences.english: He was a french historian and pedagogue.
sentences.chinese: 他是法國曆史學家和教育家。

sentences.english: Many historians consider him the father of Greek tragedies.
sentences.chinese: 許多歷史學家認爲他是希臘悲劇之父。

sentences.english: The two historians polemicized for years.
sentences.chinese: 這兩位歷史學家辯論了好多年。

sentences.english: I wonder how many historians of technology would agree with him.
sentences.chinese: 我想很多的技術歷史學家都將贊同他。

sentences.english: Many historians, of course, regard this as iniquitous.
sentences.chinese: 當然，許多歷史學家認爲這是極不公正的。

sentences.english: The judgment is shared by Wakeman and other historians.
sentences.chinese: 審判由韋克曼和其他歷史學家進行。

sentences.english: This information is of the highest utility to a historian.
sentences.chinese: 該信息對歷史學家來說十分有價值。
他是個很好的歷史學家。

definition: Joseph Needham (1900-1995), British biochemist and author of Science and Civilization in China
scholar of the rationalist school of Neo-Confucianism 理學|理学[Li3 xue2]
to comment/a point by point commentary
to write for sb else/a lawyer who writes legal documents for his clients

pinyin: Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 Da4 xue2

definition: Feng Menglong (1574-1646), late Ming dynasty novelist writing in colloquial (baihua), author of Stories Old and New 古今小說|古今小说[Gu3 jin1 Xiao3 shuo1]
Chinese phonetics (concerned also with rhyme in poetry)
